Package org.hiphap

Class Arrangement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hiphap.Event
      • org.hiphap.Arrangement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Arrangement
extends Event
    This class inherits the Event class, and adds the ability to hold other events within itself. It represents the concepts of arrangements of events.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
